articles.title: Bitcoin Fades After Strategy Sells Stock To Brace For Winter
articles.mainIdea: Bitcoin Fades After Strategy Sells Stock To Brace For Winter
articles.summary: Investor's Business Daily: Bitcoin Fades After Strategy Sells Stock To Brace For Winter. The bitcoin price jumped past $89,000 on Monday morning but gave up its gains after Strategy, the biggest corporate holder of the cryptocurrency, said it raised nearly $750 million last week with a stock sale. Strategy Related tickers mentioned: BTC-USD, STRC, STRD, STRF, STRK.
